summary:

•Teacher of the Academy of Online Learning for the course of Digital Marketing (hotel-academy.biz).

profile_positions.description:
• Federal retail networks “X5 retail group”, “METRO Cash and Carry”, “Diksi”, “Billa” Key Accounting;
•Develop and gain agreement for and implement sales plan by Key Account Customers.
• Manage the development of Customer Business Strategy and annual plan to be in line with the company’s objective and channel strategy.
•Develop and manage the trading term for negotiation with customer (to be in-line with company strategy and within assigned budget).
• Manage the sales of identified brands / products from within the range offered by the company to designed Key Account Customers;
• Preparing volume forecasts and plans.

Earlier: Office Secretary.

Achievement:
•Was promoted to Key Account Manager.
